item.title: GmAAP6a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.17g192000 Gene Symbol: GmAAP6a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GmAAP6a enhances tolerance to low nitrogen and improves seed nitrogen status by optimizing amino acid partitioning in soybean.

item.title: GmHSP17.9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.17G045800 Gene Symbol: GmHSP17.9 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A small heat shock protein, GmHSP17.

item.title: GmLba
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.20G191200 Gene Symbol: GmLba Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmbHLH300 mediates response to iron deficiency in nodule by regulating the expression of ENOD93 and GmLba.

item.title: GmLbc1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G198800 Gene Symbol: GmLbc1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmbHLH300 also affects four leghemoglobin genes (GmLba, GmLbc1, GmLbc2, and GmLbc3) that associate with nodule development and nitrogen fixation.

item.title: GmLbc2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G199000 Gene Symbol: GmLbc2 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmbHLH300 also affects four leghemoglobin genes (GmLba, GmLbc1, GmLbc2, and GmLbc3) that associate with nodule development and nitrogen fixation.

item.title: GmLbc3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G199100 Gene Symbol: GmLbc3 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmbHLH300 also affects four leghemoglobin genes (GmLba, GmLbc1, GmLbc2, and GmLbc3) that associate with nodule development and nitrogen fixation.

item.title: GmN70

item.title: GmNLA1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma03g214100 Gene Symbol: GmNLA1-1 Gene Name: nitrogen limitation adaptation 1 Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmNOD100;GmSS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13G114000 Gene Symbol: GmNOD100 GmSS1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmNOD100, a sucrose synthase in soybean nodules which was also preferentially expressed in the infected zone of nodules, similar to GmHSP17.

item.title: GmPT7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.14g188000 Gene Symbol: GmPT7 Gene Name: Phosphate Transporter7 Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmPT7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmPT7 Gene Name: phosphate transporter 7 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A nodule-localized phosphate transporter GmPT7 plays an important role in enhancing symbiotic N2 fixation and yield in soybean.

item.title: GmSPX8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmSPX8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSPX8, a nodule-localized regulator confers nodule development and nitrogen fixation under phosphorus starvation in soybean.

item.title: GmVTL1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05G121600 Gene Symbol: GmVTL1a Gene Name: vacuolar iron transporter like 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmVTL1a is an iron transporter on the symbiosome membrane of soybean with an important role in nitrogen fixation.

item.title: GmVTL1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G076300 Gene Symbol: GmVTL1b Gene Name: vacuolar iron transporter like 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmVTL1a and GmVTL1b are specifically expressed in the fixation zone of soybean nodules.

item.title: HvNLP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Hv2055A04 Gene Symbol: HvNLP2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvNLP2 controls nitrate signaling and plays an important role in NUE.

item.title: IbSnRK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbSnRK1 Gene Name: sucrose non-fermenting-1-related protein kinase-1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: These findings indicate that IbSnRK1 improves starch content and quality through systematical up-regulation of the genes and the increase in key enzyme activities involved in starch biosynthesis pathway in transgenic sweet potato.

item.title: MdMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB10 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 10 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Efficient induction of anthocyanin biosynthesis in transient assays by MdMYB10 was dependent on the co-expression of two distinct bHLH proteins from apple, MdbHLH3 and MdbHLH33.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB124 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The regulatory module MdBT2–MdMYB88/MdMYB124–MdNRTs regulates nitrogen usage in apple.

item.title: MsSPSA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsSPSA Gene Name: sucrose phosphate synthase Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: Nodule-enhanced expression of a sucrose phosphate synthase gene member (MsSPSA) has a role in carbon and nitrogen metabolism in the nodules of alfalfa.

item.title: MtAHL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g098450 Gene Symbol: MtAHL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Whereas mutation of NCR169 arrested bacteroid development at a late stage, the absence of MtAHL1 or MtAHL2 completely blocked bacteroid differentiation indicating that they also regulate other NCR genes required for the development of nitrogen-fixing nodules.

item.title: MtAHL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g080980 Gene Symbol: MtAHL2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Whereas mutation of NCR169 arrested bacteroid development at a late stage, the absence of MtAHL1 or MtAHL2 completely blocked bacteroid differentiation indicating that they also regulate other NCR genes required for the development of nitrogen-fixing nodules.

item.title: MtCOPT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g019870 Gene Symbol: MtCOPT1 Gene Name: COPT transporter 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Medicago truncatula copper transporter 1 (MtCOPT1) delivers copper for symbiotic nitrogen fixation.

item.title: MtERF74
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr2g105380 Gene Symbol: MtERF74 Gene Name: Medicago truncatula ERF-VII TF 74 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Group VII ethylene response factors, MtERF74 and MtERF75, sustain nitrogen fixation in Medicago truncatula microoxic nodules.

item.title: MtERF75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr8g022820 Gene Symbol: MtERF75 Gene Name: Medicago truncatula ERF-VII TF 75 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Group VII ethylene response factors, MtERF74 and MtERF75, sustain nitrogen fixation in Medicago truncatula microoxic nodules.

item.title: MtLHY
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtLHY Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: These data shed new light on the roles of MtLHY in the orchestration of circadian oscillator in nodules and shoots, which provides a mechanistic link between nodulation, nitrogen assimilation, and clock function.

item.title: MtMIF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MTR_4g127360 Gene Symbol: MtMIF3 Gene Name: Macrophage migration inhibitory factor 3 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Macrophage migration inhibitory factor MtMIF3 prevents the premature aging of Medicago truncatula nodules.
